Texts.Eng: Find the source of the ^green;Welcoming Beacon^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 从^green;维纳利斯^reset;处获得一个^orange;三度仪^reset;。
欢迎回到^orange;大地守护团^reset;，同志，有你的帮助我们一定能成功。我雇了一个技工来^green;修复你的FTL引擎^reset;，这样你才能继续履行你的职责！
Texts.Eng: Welcome back to the ^orange;Protectorate^reset;, Agent. With your help I know we can triumph. I've had one of our mechanics ^green;repair your FTL Drive^reset; so that you can resume your duties!

Texts.Chs: 欢迎回到^orange;大地守护团^reset;，同志，有你的帮助我们一定能成功。我们不能在这里修好你的^red;FTL引擎^reset;！你必须^green;自己做一个^reset;。拿上这个^green;曲率核心^reset;! ，用上它你可以在^orange;加工台^reset;处^green;做一个FTL引擎^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Welcome back to the ^orange;Protectorate^reset;, Agent. With your help I know we can triumph. We can't fix your ^red;broken FTL drive^reset; here! You'll have to ^green;build it on your own^reset;. Take this ^green;warp manifold^reset;! With it you can finish ^green;building your FTL drive^reset; at a ^orange;Machining Table^reset;.
